name: DROPJOY
description: DROPJOY is a 2D game where the player's goal is to rescue his joysticks from falling off the screen. The game is set in a colorful and vibrant environment with different levels of increasing difficulty. The player controls a character who can move left and right to catch the falling joysticks. The joysticks fall at different speeds and from different directions, making the game challenging and exciting. The player needs to be quick and accurate to catch as many joysticks as possible and avoid dropping any. The game also includes power-ups and bonuses that can help the player score higher and progress faster through the levels.
